section.p: Management of an injection into the epidural space of the spine. Source: The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] route with data type Code
Contains a code identifying the route of the endotracheal tube to the trachea. Lieke values: O:ORAL, N:NASAL, T:TRACHEOSTOMY., etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDose with data type Physical Quantity Interval
Contains the volume (mls.) of the test dose fluid vehicle.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDoseID with data type Id
Contains the identifier for the drug used for the epidural test dose.

Contains exactly one [1..1] route with data type Code
Contains a code identifying the route of the endotracheal tube to the trachea. Lieke values: O:ORAL, N:NASAL, T:TRACHEOSTOMY., etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDose with data type Physical Quantity Interval
Contains the volume (mls.) of the test dose fluid vehicle.

Contains exactly one [1..1] testDoseID with data type Id
Contains the identifier for the drug used for the epidural test dose.
